reviewText:
Pat Robertson delivers a message in which he elaborates on the themes of his book "The Secret Kingdom." The DVD is formated to include Pat's teaching as well as audience participation. In this first DVD (a series of three) Robertson discusses the "The Two Domains" of the Kingdom and goes on to elaborate on: The Law of Use, The Law of Reciprocity. Members from the audience are invited to ask questions. Robertson offers his response and winds up the session with a summary concusion of the materal covered.
Sound principles. Easy listening. Motivational.
I plan to see if the other two volumes are available in our church library.
